legal.checkbox: Saya telah membaca dan saya menerima Kebijakan Privasi & Persyaratan Layanan

setup.title: Atur dompet Anda
setup.body1: Anda dapat membuat beberapa profil pengguna untuk memisahkan token Anda dan meningkatkan privasi.
setup.body2: Untuk saat ini, mari kita mulai dengan nama profil depan Anda. Anda dapat menambahkan lebih banyak profil nanti.

secure.title: Amankan dompet Anda
secure.body1: Simpan dan cetak template PDF dokumen pemulihan.
secure.body2: Jika Anda mengisi documen Pemulihan dan menyimpannya dengan aman, Anda akan selalu dapat memulihkan dompet Anda.

password.title: Buat kata sandi
password.body1: Anda membutuhkan kata sandi yang aman untuk melindungi dana Anda. Gunakan kombinasi kata, dan hindari frasa, nama, atau tanggal yang umum.
password.body2: Anda disarankan untuk menuliskan kata sandi di documen Pemulihan Anda.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body1: Atur kode PIN login untuk memastikan bahwa hanya Anda yang dapat memasukkan dompet Anda.

pin.title: Atur kode PIN
pin.body1: Masukkan PIN 6 digit di bawah. Anda akan dimintai PIN untuk mengakses profil Anda.

confirmPin.title: Verifikasi kode PIN Anda
confirmPin.body1: Kode PIN Anda menjaga saldo dan transaksi Anda tetap pribadi.
confirmPin.body2: Masukkan kembali kode PIN Anda untuk melanjutkan.

backup.title: Cadangkan dompet
backup.body1: Kata-kata untuk pemulihan akun akan dimunculkan. Silakan tuliskan kata-kata tersebut.
backup.body2: Jangan bagikan kata-kata pemulihan dengan siapapun. Ini dapat digunakan untuk mengakses tokenmu.
backup.body3: Dana Anda dapat hilang jika Anda melupakan frasa pemulihan.

recoveryPhrase.title: Frasa pemulihan
recoveryPhrase.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
recoveryPhrase.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
recoveryPhrase.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyRecoveryPhrase.title: Verifikasi frasa pemulihan
verifyRecoveryPhrase.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order.
verifyRecoveryPhrase.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupWallet.title: Cadangkan ke file Stronghold
backupWallet.body1: Enter your password to backup your wallet to a Stronghold file. Your password is used to encrypt the backup.
backupWallet.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupWallet.reason1: Easily recover your wallet without typing in your recovery phrase
backupWallet.reason2: Import your wallet to other devices

recoveryPhraseSaved.title: Berhasil dicadangkan
recoveryPhraseSaved.body: Anda telah mencadangkan dompet ke Stronghold.

congratulations.title: Wallet setup completed
congratulations.body: Your new wallet is ready to use.

import.title: Impor dompet
import.body: Anda bisa mengimpornya jika ada frasa pemulihan atau file Stronghold.

importFromText.title: Pulihkan dompet dengan frasa pemulihan atau seed
importFromText.body1: A seed consists of 81 characters. This is used to recover from an older Trinity wallet.
importFromText.body2: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with spaces between. This is used to recover an existing Firefly wallet.

importFromFile.title: Restore your wallet using a backup file
importFromFile.body: Impor cadangan buat memulihkan dompet. Pencadangan bisa berupa file .stronghold atau .kdbx SeedVault Trinity.

importBackupPassword.title: Pulihkan dompet dari SeedVault atau Stronghold
importBackupPassword.body2: Ini adalah kata sandi yang dibuat saat pencadangan pertama Anda.

importSuccess.title: Anda telah berhasil memulihkan pencadangan
importSuccess.seedvaultBody: Your password is correct, you can now continue.
importSuccess.strongholdBody: Your password is correct, you can now continue.

migrate.title: Migrasikan dana Anda
migrate.body1:
Ini adalah proses otomatis untuk mentransfer dana ke dompet baru Anda. 
Kami akan memeriksa alamat yang sudah dibelanjakan yang melemahkan keamanan Anda.
migrate.body2: Mungkin butuh waktu. Jangan matikan perangkat Anda selama migrasi.

generalSettings.title: Pengaturan Umum
generalSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

security.title: Keamanan
security.description: Change your password and adjust security-related settings

advancedSettings.title: Pengaturan Lanjutan
advancedSettings.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Bantuan dan Informasi
helpAndInfo.description: Find the answer to a question or get help with an issue

profile.title: Profil
profile.description: Change your profile name or set an avatar

currency.title: Mata uang
currency.description: Adjusts balance conversion and updates chart options

exportStronghold.title: Export Backup
exportStronghold.description: Export to a Stronghold file - a complete encrypted backup of your wallet and latest transaction history.

appLock.title: Automatic Lock
appLock.description: Time elapsed before your wallet locks and logs you out

changePassword.title: Ubah kata sandinya
changePassword.description: Your password is used to secure your wallet. You must use a strong password to protect your funds.

changePincode.title: Ubah kode pin
changePincode.description: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private

resyncAccounts.title: Sinkronkan ulang akun
resyncAccounts.description: Starts a background task to make sure your accounts are up to date.

hiddenAccounts.title: Hidden accounts
hiddenAccounts.description: Selecting this options will show accounts that were previously hidden.

deleteProfile.title: Hapus profil
deleteProfile.description: Deletes your entire wallet, profile and transaction history. Make sure you have a backup.

deepLinks.title: Tautan Dalam
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking an iota:// link

developerMode.title: Mode pengembang
developerMode.description: Connect to testnets and other developer features

nodeSettings.title: Pengaturan Node
nodeSettings.description: Select Manual to configure the node settings and connect to your own node

configureNodeList.title: Select a node
configureNodeList.description: Manage the list of nodes your wallet connects to.
configureNodeList.noNodes: There are no nodes, automatic selection will be used instead.

proofOfWork.title: Bukti kerja
proofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

errorLog.title: Daftar kesalahan
errorLog.description: View errors to debug an issue

stateExport.title: Ekspor Status
stateExport.description: Export your transaction history to a .csv file

troubleshoot.title: Penyelesaian masalah
troubleshoot.description: Use the troubleshooting wizard to solve common problems

documentation.title: Dokumentasi
documentation.description: View the documentation for in depth explanations of how things work

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: View the FAQs to get help with a common problem or question

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Get help from the IOTA community on Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Report an issue
reportAnIssue.description: Report a bug to the developers. Check through to make sure it hasn't already been reported.

strongholdBackup.title: Wallet Backup
strongholdBackup.weeksAgo: {weeks, plural, one {# minggu} other {# minggu}} yang lalu

password.title: Kata sandi diperlukan
password.subtitle: Please enter your password to unlock Stronghold
password.backup: Please enter your password to export a backup

version.title: Versi Saat Ini: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: Anda menjalankan Firefly versi terbaru dan teraman.

backup.title: Cadangan terakhir {date}
backup.backupDescription: Penting untuk membuat cadangan secara teratur untuk memastikan Anda memiliki salinan akun dan riwayat transaksi Anda.
backup.backupWarning: Jika Anda kehilangan cadangan dan frase pemulihan, Anda akan kehilangan akses ke dana Anda.

deleteAccount.title: Delete {name}?
deleteAccount.body: This account has no transaction history. It can safely be deleted.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet password to confirm.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: You cannot delete this account, you must have at least one.

hideAccount.title: Hide {name}?
hideAccount.body: You can find this account later by enabling "Show hidden accounts" in Advanced Settings.
hideAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet password to confirm.
hideAccount.errorBody1: To hide an account it must have 0 balance.
hideAccount.errorBody2: You currently have {balance} remaining on this account. Please move these funds to a different account and try again.
hideAccount.errorBody3: You cannot hide this account, you must have at least one.

node.removeConfirmation: Anda yakin ingin menghapus node ini?

deleteProfile.title: Hapus profil
deleteProfile.confirmation: Apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus profil ini? Operasi ini tidak dapat dibatalkan.

general.scanQrOrPaste: Pindai kode QR atau salin sebuah Alamat
general.noAccounts: Anda tidak memiliki akun, harap buat akun.
general.accountRemoved: This account is hidden. Unhide it to perform transfers.

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# hari} other {# hari}} yang lalu
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# minggu} other {# minggu}} yang lalu
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# bulan} other {# bulan}} yang lalu
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# tahun} other {# tahun}} yang lalu

notifications.updateError: Terjadi kesalahan selama pembaruan. Silakan mencoba kembali
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {1 minute remaining} other {#sisa menit}}

profile.length: Nama profil Anda tidak boleh lebih dari {length, plural, one {1 karakter} other {# karakter}}.
profile.duplicate: Profil dengan nama ini sudah ada.

password.tooWeak: Kata sandi baru Anda telah dibuat.
password.row: Baris kata kunci yang lurus mudah ditebak.
password.pattern: Pola pengetikan keyboard pendek mudah ditebak.
password.names: Nama umum dan nama keluarga mudah ditebak.
password.common: Ini adalah kata sandi yang sangat umum.
password.similar: Ini mirip dengan kata sandi yang umum digunakan.
password.word: A single word is easy to guess.
password.length: Nama profil Anda tidak boleh lebih dari {length, plural, one {1 karakter} other {# karakter}}.

pincode.length: kode pin Anda harus terdiri dari {length, plural, one {1 digit} other {# digit}}
pincode.incorrect: Kata sandi Anda saat ini salah.

account.length: Nama akun Anda tidak boleh lebih dari {length, plural, one {1 karakter} other {# karakter}}.
account.empty: Anda harus sudah menggunakan akun Anda saat ini sebelum Anda dapat membuat yang baru.
account.notEmpty: Anda harus mentransfer saldo Anda sebelum menghapus akun ini.
account.duplicate: Akun dengan nama tersebut sudah ada.
account.tilde: A profile name can't start with the '~' character.
account.control: A profile name can't contain a control character.
account.startDot: A profile name can't start with the '.' character.
account.chars: A profile name can't contain the following characters <>:"/\|?*

send.addressLength: Alamat harus terdiri dari {length, plural, one {1 karakter} other {# karakter}}.
send.amountTooHigh: Ini lebih besar dari saldo Anda yang tersedia.
send.amountNoFloat: Jika unitnya adalah `i` Anda tidak dapat menggunakan tempat desimal.
send.amountInvalidFormat: Jumlah tersebut sepertinya merupakan angka yang tidak valid.
send.wrongAddressFormat: The address is not correctly formatted.
send.noToAccount: You have not selected an account to send the funds to.
send.sendingDust: You cannot send less than 1 Mi.
send.leavingDust: You cannot leave less than 1 Mi on your address.

node.https: HTTPS diperlukan. Siapkan profil pengembang untuk menggunakan koneksi HTTP tidak aman.
node.unsynced: The node is not in sync.

backup.seedTooShort: Benih harus sepanjang 81 karakter, tetapi memang demikian {length, plural, one {1} other {#}}
backup.seedCharacters: Seed hanya boleh mengandung karakter A-Z atau 9
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is 1} other {are #}}.
backup.phraseUnrecognizedWord: Kata "{word}" yang tidak dikenal dalam frasa pemulihan Anda
backup.phraseCaseWord: The word "{word}" should be lower case
